pages.import.upload.title: Click or drag file to this area to upload
pages.import.format.error: The CSV file format is incorrect or the data is empty
pages.import.hint.line1.after: and fill in the template according to the requirements before uploading.
pages.import.hint.line2: Only files with suffixes csv are supported, the file size is limited to 10M, and the number of imported entries each time does not exceed 300.
pages.importLogin.title: Import Logins/Passwords from CSV file
pages.importLogin.hint.line1.after: to prepare the data for importing. You may also import your logins/passwords which saved in your Chrome or Edge browsers. For example, in Chrome, go to <chrome://settings/passwords>, you can export all your login/password records in a csv file, and this csv file can be imported here.
